page.title: 08TOURISM continued
page.content: {The Centre}also offers a 25m indoor heated leisure pool with solarium sun- tan units,sauna suites,Turbo Spa bath, exercise equipment and learner pool; Britain's largest all year indoor skating,curling and ice hockey rink with 3 squash courts adjacent,table tennis and full size snooker tables, carting circuit;dry ski-slopes with tow;shopping areas;Highland Craft Village and Santa Claus Land together with easy parking for over 700 cars. The Centre's new managing director has plans for{future development}which include building a gymnasium to link the swimming pool and ice-rink areas. A larger shopping complex is also planned.His intention is to create a {tourist magnet}which will attract visitors from all over the world, creating greater wealth and employment throughout the Spey Valley.
